Industrial. Commercial. Professional. Pro Antiseptic Sanitiser

AntiSeptix PRO Hand Sanitiser Ready-to-Use 5l

A food-grade, non-toxic, vegan, non-alcohol hand sanitiser which kills 99.9% of bacteria, fungus and viruses, including E.coli, salmonella, coronavirus, poliovirus, norovirus and flu while leaving no chemical or alcohol residue.

More Info

AntiSeptix PRO Disinfectant Ready-to-Use 500ml

AntiSeptix Multi Surface Disinfectant is a surface disinfectant spray that kills 99.9% of bacteria, fungus and viruses, including E.coli, salmonella, coronavirus, poliovirus, norovirus and flu. AntiSeptix Multi Surface Disinfectant is a chemical free, ZERO alcohol, non-toxic, fragrance-free disinfectant that has odour eliminating properties, as well as being harmless to the skin.

More Info

A food-grade, non-toxic, vegan, non-alcohol hand sanitiser which kills 99.9% of bacteria, fungus and viruses, including E.coli, salmonella, coronavirus, poliovirus, norovirus and flu while leaving no chemical or alcohol residue.
